name: UITextDropProposal
desc: A proposed configuration for the behavior of a text drop interaction.

items.name: var dropAction: UITextDropProposal.Action
items.desc: A text drop action style that specifies how the text view receives dropped items.

items.name: enum UITextDropProposal.Action
items.desc: The text drop action styles for text views.

items.name: var dropPerformer: UITextDropProposal.Performer
items.desc: The performer that is responsible for handling the drop operation.

items.name: enum UITextDropProposal.Performer
items.desc: The performers that are responsible for handling the drop operation.

items.name: var dropProgressMode: UITextDropProposal.ProgressMode
items.desc: A mode that specifies how the text view indicates progress to the user when loading dropped items.

items.name: enum UITextDropProposal.ProgressMode
items.desc: The text drop progress styles for user-visible progress indication.

items.name: var useFastSameViewOperations: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the text view can use fast inline dropping when the source and destination are in the same text view.
